t: Amazon.com: Easy Curves Kit : Toys & Games
s: I have been using Easy Curves for years and my arms and chest are quite firm especially for my age (almost 50!). I got my first Easy Curves Kit years ago and used it it constantly. I was expecting to see some lift to my breasts but I didn't expect that my arms would firm up as well.
